name: SplashDrop
description:
Kick back and spray paint your way to ultimate relaxation.
Nothing beats tagging some brick wall in a back alley!

You can:

  • shoot paint with left mouse button
  • press right mouse button to pump the pressure higher
  • switch backgrounds by pressing 1, 2, 3, 4
  • reset the current canvas by pressing spacebar
  • switch colors by spinning the mouse wheel
